title: Weekly Digest (6 October, 2019 - 13 October, 2019)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 75 issues were created.
Of these, 36 issues have been closed and 39 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #9185 [Message fetching after being offline takes way too long](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9185), by [oskarth](https://github.com/oskarth)
:green_heart: #9184 [Set password keyboard starts uppercase on old android (6.0.1)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9184), by [3esmit](https://github.com/3esmit)
:green_heart: #9183 [URL Format for Transaction Requests "universal links" EIP681 in v1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9183), by [3esmit](https://github.com/3esmit)
:green_heart: #9182 [[fix 8853] fix change of whisper id in ens registration](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9182), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #9181 [Can't add several custom mailservers until relogin](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9181), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9180 [Account name remains if you change address to another on "Send transaction"  screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9180), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9179 [Temporarily delete PN across the app](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9179), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9178 [WIP](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9178), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #9177 [Keycard onboarding UI touchups](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9177), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9176 [drop support of the LES fleet](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9176), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #9174 [It's possible to go back while creating new multiaccount](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9174), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9173 [Onboarding screens UI glitches ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9173), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9172 [Upgrade xcode version to 11.1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9172), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:green_heart: #9171 [Enable high priority tests in PRs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9171), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #9170 [Add new welcome page after generating their key](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9170), by [elegant651](https://github.com/elegant651)

:green_heart: #9140 [No conversion for some tokens and currencies ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9140), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9137 [Bumps galore](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9137), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #9136 [No Push Notifications when app is closed [Android]](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9136), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #9135 [User is not asked to re-login after changing Fleet settings (and no mailserver selected)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9135), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #9133 [Desktop app doesn't start on LInux](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9133), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #9131 [Group chat UI cleanup [DRAFT]](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9131), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)

:+1: #9149 [Fixing random capitalization](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9149), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
It received :+1: x1, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x1.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #9134 [Feature/dapp accounts](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9134), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
It received 17 comments.

Last week, 45 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
